text: Thanks for the response Jon. Weâ€™re currently not using any custom form embed, as the final page is being built directly within HubSpot. I understand these might take some time, but wanted to point this out here so they can be shared with the developers in charge of making these updates.

Could you please consider making the blog templating more granular like WordPress? When editing the blog listing template you are unable to customize the different views using the drag and drop editor (index, frontpage, author, topic) - Please vote if you agree <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/More-granular-blog-templates-to-help-with-themes/idi-p/548427#M100256>
